sourceMeaningMnemonic: Take this <radical>thread</radical> and look at this <radical>part</radical>. Now look at this part! Now look at this part. You don't know where to look! Haha, I have <kanji>distract</kanji>ed you!
meaningInfo: You don't know what part of the thread to look at. What a distraction.
readingMnemonic: Despite how distracted you are, that was indeed a lot of <reading>fun</reading> (<ja>ふん</ja>).
readingInfo: Imagine yourself really enjoying looking at parts of the thread. You don't know why it's so fun, but being derpy is exciting, I guess.
